CustomField.description: The Last Name that was supplied by the customer when initiating the chat. This field is used to automatically link a Contact when a LiveChatTranscript record is crated. Note: The field is not updated when a Contact is linked and may not reflect the actual customer's details.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The The Last Name that was supplied by the customer when initiating the chat.
CustomField.label: Last Name
